Posts.Content: MY MOM (AGE 67) WAS JUST TOLD OF HER CYTOLOGY RESULTS (FROM A CYST ASPIRATION LAST THURSDAY) THAT THERE ARE CANCER CELLS--WHAT QUESTIONS DO WE ASK FROM HERE....ANY AND ALL INPUT WOULD BE HELPFUL--SHE IS SCHEDULED FOR A DIAGNOSTIC MAMMO AND AN US TOMARROW--MRI AFTER THAT--I WANT TO ACCOMPANY HER ON HER DR VISITS, AND DO HAVE SOME MEDICAL BACKGROUND--PLEASE HELP!!!!
Posts.Title: MOM, NEW DIAG

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by Vee Smith I am sorry you are facing this. If you go to this site, it has a list of questions to ask: http://www.cancersurvivors.org/Resou...ions.htm#tests I hope all goes well. Let us know how things go. thank you so much!!!
Posts.Title: MOM, NEW DIAG
